name: Momo-gama
description:
This is an student project made in the context of the assignature "Introducción a la Programación - Cátedra Rosenthal" from the "Diseño de Imagen y Sonido" career in the Universidad de Buenos Aires.  We'd probably make new updates with sprites included.
Illustrations were made by Belén Ruta. Sound Desing by Luciano Colotto. Music by Miranda Rodriguez & Francisco Casado. Programming by Luciano Colotto, Miranda Rodriguez & Jeremías Tofé.
